thread.title: Strictly Come Dancing: Iwan Thomas and Ola Jordan are the first couple to exit - Strictly Come Dancing Reality TV
thread.title_full: Strictly Come Dancing: Iwan Thomas and Ola Jordan are the first couple to exit - Strictly Come Dancing News - Reality TV - Digital Spy

author: Ian Sandwell
title: Strictly Come Dancing: Iwan Thomas and Ola Jordan are the first couple to exit - Strictly Come Dancing Reality TV
text: Iwan Thomas and his professional partner Ola Jordan have become the first couple to be eliminated from Strictly Come Dancing.The pair found themselves in the dance-off against Jamelia and Tristan MacManus, after the judges' scores were combined with the viewers' votes. © BBC Pictures / Guy Levy Strictly Come Dancing Week Two: All the scores and judges' commentsThomas and Jordan cha-cha'd to LMFAO's 'Sexy and I Know It', and Jamelia and MacManus performed to the Pussycat Dolls' 'Don't Cha'.Craig Revel Horwood, Darcey Bussell and Bruno Tonioli all voted to save Jamelia and MacManus, sending Thomas and Jordan home. Head judge Len Goodman said that he agreed with his fellow judges' decision. © BBC Pictures / Guy Levy Strictly Come Dancing 2015 live blog: Week Two as it happenedAfter his elimination, Thomas stated that he "loved every minute" on the show and didn't want to go home, before praising his partner."I've loved training with you, it has been amazing," he said. "Believe it or not, I was getting slightly better each day."Jordan replied: "I have absolutely loved dancing with you. You are a wonderful person, and I am sorry it finished so early." © BBC / Guy Levy The results show also featured a performance from Rod Stewart.Strictly Come Dancing airs next weekend on Saturday, October 10 at 6.20pm and Sunday, October 11 at 7.15pm on BBC One with a Movie Week special.
